description:
Watch live football matches on FIFA+ - Stream soccer matches, replays, highlights, scores, and exclusive content anytime, anywhere.
The FIFA+ app is your official home for live football, match replays and the game’s greatest stories. With a bold new design and powerful new features, FIFA+ brings you closer to the sport you love - From FIFA World Cup™ moments to live matches across the globe. This autumn, you can stream the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™, FIFA U-17 Women’s World Cup Morocco 2025 and FIFA U-17 Men’s World Cup Quatar exclusively on Fifa+ in selected countries with many more competitions to come!

Live Football Streaming Worldwide
Stream thousands of live football matches from over 230 competitions and 100+ Football Associations. FIFA+ offers unrivalled coverage of men’s and women’s FIFA tournaments, youth competitions including the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™ and FIFA World Cup™ Qualifiers in selected countries.
- Watch live football and soccer matches from around the world
- Follow the road to FIFA World Cup 26™ with live qualifiers and match highlights
- The official home of Classic FIFA World Cup™ matches and original documentaries
- Get live match updates, scores and kick-off alerts instantly

Match Replays, Highlights and FIFA World Cup™ Archive
Missed a game? Relive the match day action with full game replays, match highlights, and expert commentary. Re-watch iconic FIFA World Cup™ moments and explore the football archive to watch historic games and unforgettable goals! With in-depth highlights and detailed post-match analysis, you’ll never miss a thing.

Original Football Content and Stories
Go beyond the pitch with exclusive documentaries, player profiles and untold stories from around the world of football. Discover original series that dive into the stories of legendary players, rivalries and soccer teams from around the world.

Access premium content only available on FIFA+
- Match alerts and notifications: Never miss a goal or kick-off.
- Watch from the start: Rewind live tournament match streams so you can catch up on games
at your convenience.
- Watch next: Get automatic content suggestions tailored to your viewing.
- Improved search and filters: Easily find teams, matches, tournaments and highlights.
- Simple sign-in: Use your FIFA ID to unlock full access to the FIFA+ streaming app.

THE OFFICIAL FOOTBALL STREAMING APP BY FIFA
Stream live football, match replays and FIFA World Cup™ highlights right from your phone. FIFA+ is the only official FIFA app with exclusive access to tournaments and global
competitions.
Download the FIFA+ app today and stream live football, match highlights, documentaries and FIFA World Cup™ content - All in one place. Experience the world’s game, your way.

With over 20M active users and more than 2K competitions worldwide, you’ll have everything at your fingertips: live minute-by-minute match updates, personalised notifications for your favourite competitions, teams, and players, detailed stats, goals and the latest football news on transfers and the football market.

Don't miss a single match of the Premier League 2025/26 and UEFA Champions League seasons. Get all the live score, goals, stats, and news in our football app.

>> WITH BESOCCER: FOOTBALL LIVE SCORE
• Check today’s match schedules and football results.
• Find out where to watch the matches live.
• Stay connected with direct notifications for the latest news, standout players, teams, and transfer market updates.
• Share your opinions live during matches and on the latest news with our active user community.
• Live analysis and predictions of match results.
• Detailed statistics of each player, team or competition. 
• Images and video summaries of matches, teams or your favourite players.
• Navigate a simple, user-friendly interface with a sleek design.
• New audio commentaries on live matches.

>> CHECK LIVE SCORES, STATS & STANDINGS
Follow football from all over the world, including men’s and women’s competitions:
- Premier League, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Bundesliga and other top leagues.
- UEFA Champions League, Europa League, Conference League, FA Cup, Carabao Cup.
- Intercontinental Cup, UEFA Nations League, and many more!

>> ALL THE LATEST FOOTBALL AND TRANSFER MARKET NEWS
Check out all the latest football news and stay up to date on every move:
- Follow confirmed signings and transfer rumours.
- Discover which players are on the radar of Barcelona, Real Madrid, Bayern, PSG and other top European clubs.
- Find out which stars Liverpool, Manchester United, Chelsea, Arsenal and Manchester City are targeting.

>> FULL FOOTBALL FIXTURE SCHEDULES
Get match times for today’s games and upcoming key fixtures. Check past and future matchdays, where to watch the matches live, and stay updated with the latest news.

>>PROBABLES LINEUPS
See all the probables and confirmed lineups for the match live, along with each player´s performance and ratings.

>> SEARCH EVERYTHING YOU NEED INSTANTLY
Use our powerful search engine to find all the data you need on players, teams, and competitions:
- Who has scored more goals: Haaland or Mbappé?
- Who has won more titles: Messi or Cristiano?
- How many goals has Harry Kane scored?
- Which teams have the most league titles? Man City, Man United or Liverpool?
- Who won the last Ballon d’Or?

>> CUSTOMISE THE APP YOUR WAY
Set up the app to match your preferences and receive live notifications for your favourite teams, players, and competitions:
- Live match goals, results, and standings.
- Probable and confirmed line-ups.
- News, signings, and transfer rumours.

----------
Your feedback helps us improve every day!
We constantly enhance the app based on user suggestions and comments.

Our goal is to provide you with the most complete and up-to-date football experience, including live scores, breaking news, and in-depth statistics.
If your favourite league, team, or player is missing, let us know, and we’ll add them! BeSoccer is made for football lovers like you!

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:

• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.

• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.

• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

Our sports betting application will allow you to place a bet on your favorite team, sporting event, without using real money. The BetNetix offers you up-to-date odds, more than 15 sports, real-time bets without the slightest risk of financial losses! Feel the real excitement while keeping your wallet safe.



SPORT IS REAL!
Here the user finds only the current events. You can track them in real time. You can check stats that contain useful information about the matches, the teams' state, progress in the last five games, number of shots per game, fouls, and squad lineups. 
There are more than 15 sports in the app: traditional football, volleyball, hockey, tennis, all types of wrestling, MMA, etc., as well as e-sports (Counter-Strike, Dota, etc.).



ONLY VERIFIED BETTING ODDS
The application works on the basis of real odds. Exactly the same ones are used by real bookmaker companies. Thus, BetNetix recreates a real sports betting gameplay with a full experience of possible risks, the joy of victory and the experience of defeat. All emotions are like with real bets only without real money.



HOW IT WORKS
Upon entering, user receives a certain amount of in-game currency to the account in the application's personal account. With its help, you can make any kind of bets on all kinds of events. Finding what you need is easy - the app features all kinds of sporting events and activities. A user-friendly interface will help you find what you need and make a certain bet. The application works both with upcoming events and in real time.



BET LIKE A PRO
Our betsim allows you to subscribe to your favorite teams or matches in your personal account, track events, view analytics. Setting up push notifications, as well as an analyzer of past and current matches, will help you not to miss the main thing. Do your own sports betting like a pro.



BE THE FIRST!
The excitement and risk in BetNetix are exclusively real. The intensity of passions is provided by real sporting events, proven bookmaker betting odds, competent analytics. And in order for the user to fully experience the spirit of competition, the app has internal ratings and tops of the best players. Climb to their top and become the first sports expert.



GET TO THE NEXT LEVEL - BECOME A BOOKMAKER
BetNetix invites its users to reach a new level of the game, moving from the category of ordinary players to the role of organizers of the process. Invite your friends and acquaintances to the app, create a gaming network under your personal guidance and get virtual income from each player. You get statistics on every match to ensure that you make accurate sport predictions. Our sports betting game is a unique opportunity to learn from personal experience how the bookmaker business works.



100% SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY
All bets in the betsim are made exclusively with the in-game currency. In our app, you cannot use payment cards, e-wallets and other services for real financial transactions. The player has only the conditional currency of the application at his disposal. It cannot be bought, withdrawn, paid with it for anything outside. All in-game calculations are valid only within the application and are designed to give exclusively emotional joy without financial loss!



SOCIAL PRIORITIES
You cannot make a real bet in the application, as well as receive a cash prize or reward.
The virtual currency received in the application cannot be exchanged for real money or used in any payment systems.

Stay connected with all the latest football action, match details, and news in one place! Hola Football Live app provides matches updates, match previews, live commentary, and in-depth stats for your favorite teams and matches across a variety of competitions. Whether you're following live matches scores, browsing team line-ups or checking standings, this app is designed to enhance your football experience.

Key Features of Hola Football Live App:

• Live Match Updates: Get all matches notifications and follow all the key moments from your favorite teams and competitions.
  
• Personalized Favorites: Add teams, matches, and leagues to your favorites for easy access to the latest updates and schedules.
  
• In-Depth Stats: Track player stats, assists, goals, yellow and red cards, and more. Monitor team performances across the season, from match results to top goal scorers and assists.

• Head-to-Head Comparisons: Analyze detailed team comparisons before each match, including historical performance data.
  
• Comprehensive Standings: Stay on top of your favorite leagues and competitions with up-to-date standings, filtered by home and away performance.
  
• Interactive Commentary: Follow live matche, play-by-play commentary that immerses you in the match, including key moments like goals, fouls, and substitutions.
  
• Upcoming Matches: Never miss a game with detailed schedules of upcoming fixtures. Whether it's your favorite team or a major event, you’ll know when and where the action is happening.

• News Feed: Stay up-to-date with the latest football news, transfers, and analysis, customized to your preferences. Get insights on potential player signings and major updates from your followed teams.
  
• Detailed Team Pages: View detailed profiles of your favorite teams, including recent matches, squad lists, and player statistics.

• Multi-League Coverage: Follow matches and standings across various leagues and competitions. Add leagues to your favorites for quick access to the most relevant action.

Hola Football Live app offers the perfect platform for football enthusiasts who want a one-stop app for match tracking, team updates, and engaging news content. With its sleek and easy-to-navigate interface, it’s never been easier to stay up-to-date with everything happening in the world of football.

À l'occasion des événements sportifs au Maroc, un écosystème numérique innovant a été développé pour offrir aux supporters, visiteurs, volontaires et organisateurs une expérience 100% digitalisée. L'application YALLA est le compagnon de l'ensemble des grands événements sportifs organisés ou coorganisé par la Fédération Royale Marocaine du Football au Maroc.
YALLA offre la possibilité de :
- Créer et gérer le FAN ID, indispensable pour accéder aux stades et Fan Zones
- Déposer une demande d'e-Visa en ligne si nécessaire.
- Accéder aux actualités, programmes et informations pratiques liées aux événements sportifs.
- Consulter les services liés à l'organisation : transport, hébergement et activités.
- Rester informé en temps réel des mises à jour officielles.
YALLA centralise tous les services numériques afin que chaque participant profite pleinement des compétitions sportives au Maroc.

Get unrivalled coverage of Europe's ultimate club football competition. The official UEFA Champions League app brings you the latest soccer news, scores, draws, live coverage, next-day video highlights and our free Fantasy Football game.
 
FOLLOW THE UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE
 
- Get live minute-by-minute updates from every single match.
- With the live bracket, see the path to the final – and watch it update live as goals go in.
- Simulate scorelines and see how they might affect the knockout stages.
- Don’t miss a single goal thanks to real-time push notifications.
- Listen to live match commentary on the go.
- Review the goals in detail with next-day highlights for every match*.
- Get live match statistics for every game.
- Access all the fixtures and up-to-date standings.
- Read the latest football news and analysis from UEFA experts.
- Dive straight into the news that matters to you with our personalised home feed.
- Watch the live draws.
- Get a heads up with notifications for all kick-offs, confirmed line-ups and draws.
- Keep up to speed on each club thanks to in-depth form guides about the top teams in the Premier League, La Liga, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Analyse individual team pages, squads and player pages
- Have your say by voting for your Player and Goal of the Week after each matchday.
 
EXPLORE THE ARCHIVES
 
- Access all-time player statistics: everything from the top goalscorer to the most yellow cards.
- Access all-time club statistics and results: everything from the most titles to the most goals conceded.

- Join leagues with other supporters from your club. If you’re a Real Madrid fan, compete against other Real Madrid fans. If you’re a Juventus fan, battle against other Juventus fans on the Juve fans’ leaderboard.
- Play Fantasy Football and live UEFA Champions League nights in a whole new way!

NOVA Soccer Hub App - delivers a complete Soccer tracking experience for fans worldwide. Whether you want to follow live scores, analyze matches, check team lineups, or explore player profiles, this app has it all—wrapped in a clean and intuitive interface.

NOVA Soccer Hub App Key Features:

* Live Match Center - Follow real-time updates with live scores, match time, key events, and team lineups.

* Detailed Statistics - View comprehensive stats including shots, passes, fouls, offsides, possession, and more—visually compared between both sides.

* Fixture & Schedule View - Plan ahead or look back with a calendar-based view of upcoming and past matches sorted by day.

* Predictions & Analytics - Check team performance, form streaks, head-to-head comparisons, and match outcome predictions based on data.

* Point Tables & Standings - Track team positions and points across various leagues and tournaments.

* Team Overview & Profiles - Get venue details, overall performance records, and recent match outcomes. Explore squad rosters categorized by position.

* Player Profiles - Dive into individual player stats, bio details (age, height, nationality, position), recent matches, and league-wise performance breakdown.

* Explore by Country - Search and filter content based on your favorite countries or regions, allowing for a personalized football-following experience.

* Favorites Tab - Save your favorite matches, teams, players, and leagues to quickly access them anytime from one central tab.

Whether you're a casual viewer or a dedicated football analyst, NOVA Soccer Hub App is dedicated to stay informed, entertained, and engaged—no matter the league, team, or competition. Download Nova Soccer Hub app now.
